description:
The development script, contrib/nova.sh is broken.  It seems to be maintained here:
https://raw.github.com/vishvananda/novascript/master/nova.sh

However, for many it is useful to have it in the tree.  

Thanks.
title: contrib/nova.sh is broken, due to syntax changes

comments.content:
The development script, contrib/nova.sh is broken.  It seems to be maintained here:

However, for many it is useful to have it in the tree.

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~davewalker

comments.content: I think it should just be removed, since it's not maintained.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: This was fixed in Change-Id: I7a07a58a9a6f1112fc7e486367a06f6916207784 on 15Nov2011.
